paragraphs.title: Normal Scala/Java Set
paragraphs.text:
import com.madhukaraphatak.sizeof.SizeEstimator

val memorySizeString = SizeEstimator.estimate("abc");

val set = (Set(1) ++ Set(2,3) ++ Set(3,4) ++ Set(5))
val memorySizeSet = SizeEstimator.estimate(set)

result.msg:
import com.madhukaraphatak.sizeof.SizeEstimator
memorySizeString: Long = 48
set: scala.collection.immutable.Set[Int] = Set(5, 1, 2, 3, 4)
memorySizeSet: Long = 312

paragraphs.title: Option 1:  HyperLogLog Aggregator
paragraphs.text:
import com.twitter.algebird.HLL
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLog._
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogAggregator

val hllAgg = HyperLogLogAggregator.withBits[Int](14)

val hllAggs = hllAgg(List(1)) + hllAgg(List(1,2)) + hllAgg(List(2,3)) + hllAgg(List(3,4)) + hllAgg(List(4,5)) + hllAgg(List(5))
val memorySizeHllAggs = SizeEstimator.estimate(hllAggs)

val hllAggs2 = hllAgg((List(1) ++ List(2,3) ++ List(3,4) ++ List(5)))
val memorySizeHllAggs2 = SizeEstimator.estimate(hllAggs)

val approxSize = hllAggs.approximateSize
val approxSizeMin = approxSize.min
val approxSizeEstimate = approxSize.estimate
val approxSizeMax = approxSize.max
val approxSizeEstimateProbabilityWithinBounds = approxSize.probWithinBounds

val estimatedSize = hllAggs.estimatedSize
val estimatedSizeInt = estimatedSize.toInt

result.msg:
import com.twitter.algebird.HLL
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLog._
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogAggregator
hllAgg: com.twitter.algebird.GenHLLAggregator[Int] = GenHLLAggregator(com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogMonoid@3ee882fb,com.twitter.algebird.Hash128$$anon$5@7fe1d2e9)
hllAggs: com.twitter.algebird.HLL = SparseHLL(14,Map(10388 -> Max(1), 9650 -> Max(1), 15708 -> Max(2), 10082 -> Max(3), 6205 -> Max(1)))
memorySizeHllAggs: Long = 680
hllAggs2: com.twitter.algebird.HLL = SparseHLL(14,Map(10388 -> Max(1), 9650 -> Max(1), 15708 -> Max(2), 10082 -> Max(3), 6205 -> Max(1)))
memorySizeHllAggs2: Long = 680
approxSize: com.twitter.algebird.Approximate[Long] = Approximate(4,5,6,0.9972)
approxSizeMin: Long = 4
approxSizeEstimate: Long = 5
approxSizeMax: Long = 6
approxSizeEstimateProbabilityWithinBounds: Double = 0.9972
estimatedSize: Double = 5.0007630947088195
estimatedSizeInt: Int = 5

paragraphs.title: Option 2:  HyperLogLog Monoid
paragraphs.text:
import com.twitter.algebird.HLL
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLog._
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogMonoid

val hllMonoid = new HyperLogLogMonoid(14)
val lists = (List(1) ++ List(2,3) ++ List(3,4) ++ List(5))
val hlls = lists.map(hllMonoid.create(_))

val combinedHllMonoid = hllMonoid.sum(hlls)
val memorySizeCombinedHllMonoid = SizeEstimator.estimate(combinedHllMonoid)
val approxSizeEstimateHllMonoid = hllMonoid.sizeOf(combinedHllMonoid)

result.msg:
import com.twitter.algebird.HLL
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLog._
import com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogMonoid
hllMonoid: com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogMonoid = com.twitter.algebird.HyperLogLogMonoid@312033cc
lists: List[Int] = List(1, 2, 3, 3, 4, 5)
hlls: List[com.twitter.algebird.HLL] = List(SparseHLL(14,Map(9650 -> Max(1))), SparseHLL(14,Map(10082 -> Max(3))), SparseHLL(14,Map(6205 -> Max(1))), SparseHLL(14,Map(6205 -> Max(1))), SparseHLL(14,Map(10388 -> Max(1))), SparseHLL(14,Map(15708 -> Max(2))))
combinedHllMonoid: com.twitter.algebird.HLL = SparseHLL(14,Map(10388 -> Max(1), 9650 -> Max(1), 15708 -> Max(2), 10082 -> Max(3), 6205 -> Max(1)))
memorySizeCombinedHllMonoid: Long = 680
approxSizeEstimateHllMonoid: com.twitter.algebird.Approximate[Long] = Approximate(4,5,6,0.9972)
